# EduVillage – Backend

This folder contains the backend part of the **EduVillage – Online Learning Platform**.

## Purpose
The backend is responsible for:
- Handling business logic
- Managing users and roles
- Storing and retrieving data
- Securing the application

## Core Responsibilities
- User authentication and authorization
- Role-based access control (Student / Teacher / Admin)
- Course and content management
- Progress tracking and assessments
- Notifications and communication
- Admin reporting and analytics

## Planned Modules
- User & Authentication Module
- Course & Content Management Module
- Student Dashboard & Progress Tracking
- Assessment & Grading Module
- Communication & Notification Module
- Administration & Reporting Module

## Tech Stack (Planned)
- Node.js
- Express.js
- Database (to be finalized)

## Current Status
- Backend folder initialized
- API development will begin in upcoming phases

## Notes
- Security and clean architecture are priorities
- Backend logic will strictly align with project requirements
